descriptions.title: Timely maintenance guarantees reliability
text: Akbarys has a service center to perform maintenance and repairs

descriptions.title: You are in the right hands
text: Akbarys Service Center delivers professional servicing and maintenance not only for our own equipment, but also customers' equipment. The company's personnel are certified by the equipment manufacturer
All technical tools involved in the servicing take regular inspections and maintenance as per the schedule and operating manuals.

thirdBlock.title: Regional operations
descriptions: Company experts work both at the customer sites and in specialized laboratories located in the Kazakhstan regions.

For the most complete and rapid response to customer requests, and to reduce service time in large industrial regions, we established local service units, which allows to provide servicing and support for customer equipment in a quickest manner. In addition to the central Uralsk division, such units were made in Astana, Aksai, Aktobe, Atyrau, and Aktau.

fouthBlock.title: Qualified personnel
fouthBlock.description: The Service Center personnel recurrently improve their qualification and get unplanned training when new tools and service regulations are introduced.
